title: The most wonderful and pleasaunt history of Titus and Gisippus whereby is fully declared the figure of perfect frendshyp, drawen into English metre. By Edwarde Lewicke. Anno. 1562.
author: Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375.
publisher: By Thomas Hacket, and are to be solde at hys shop in Lumbarde streete,
notes: A translation of day 10, novel 8 of: Boccaccio, Giovanni.  Decamerone.
Printer's name and address from colophon.
Identified as STC 15556+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
